  org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.ReferenceResolverHelperImpl
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescriptionImpl
          org.smartfrog.services.dns.DNSComponentImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, DNSComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Copying, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.MessageKeys, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.PrettyPrinting, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Tags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.TagsComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.ReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.ReferenceResolverHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
DNSBindingIPImpl, DNSCollectionImpl, DNSDataImpl, DNSOpaqueImpl, DNSOptionsImpl, DNSViewImpl, DNSZoneImpl
public abstract class DNSComponentImpl
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescriptionImpl
implements DNSComponent

An abstract class that implements the component description interface for dns components.

                         org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Context cxt)
                  throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException
The "real" constructor of this component. It will recursively try to instantiate and configure all the components passed in its context.

Specified by:
sfDeployWith in interface DNSComponent
Parameters:
parent - A parent in the description hierarchy.
cxt - A context from which to obtain arguments to configure this object.
Throws:
SmartFrogException - if an error occurs while initializing this component or any of its sub-components.
